entries.femaleVariant: This is Gillean Jordan from N54 News. We interrupt this program for a special message from President Myers.
Arasaka Corp.'s increasingly antagonistic language has caused my administration great unease.
Any accusations of Militech or NUS involvement in the death of Saburo Arasaka are not only unfounded, but profoundly irresponsible.
Both Militech and the NUS government have steadfastly respected and adhered to the provisions of the Arvin Accord.
However, if provoked, I can assure you that we are thoroughly prepared to respond in full force.
In the Unification War, we, as a nation, exposed Saburo Arasaka to the truth that he is not omnipotent. If necessary, I will not hesitate to teach his son the same lesson.
We can only hope President Myers's unflinching stance will temper Arasaka's aggressive and reckless rhetoric.
We now return you to your regularly scheduled program.
